caption: Atmosphere was really comfortable and relaxing in the newer addition to the right as you approach. Lauren took care of us and did a wonderful job. She had excellent knowledge of menu and was able to pair wine perfectly with our orders. There was a small issue with our food that she worked quickly and efficiently to fix. Overall wonderful experience. The staff made sure that our special night was enjoyed to the max extent possible. Wonderful service and food.
Great food and a wonderful way to spend an evening. Highly recommend.
Best Italian food hands down!
Wonderful as always. Great food and a great atmosphere.
Food and service are excellent! Hannah is an exceptional server. Ambience is perfect!!!!! We’ll be back!!!

The side greek salad was great.  The Lasagna was well, no way around it, it was horrible.  One of the worst I've ever had.  They sliced sausage instead of ground, made it even worse.  The bread would have been great if it where dipped in a garlic olive oil but, it tasted like dipped athletes foot. I'm sorry to give such a bad review but, it was bad. desertt to.
Great pasta and tiramisu. Bread was fresh and soft.

AMAZING! Authentic Italian cuisine, great atmosphere and location.  Justin was our bartender/server and he was so nice and very knowledgeable of the menu.  Definitely requesting his section next time!  Best Italian in Pensacola!
Very good food, healthy portions. Music was very loud, I couldn’t talk to people or hear my waitress.
Food is great. Service is great. Very accommodating.
Really good Italian. The best in Pensacola by far. However, if I was to compare this place to some in little italy in NY city this would be a 3 star.

Hands down the best italian place in town. The food is always good and made to order. The staff is always friendly. If you go make your reservation for outdoor seating, the atmosphere is much better. Whether it be in the front our out back. The inside is small and kind of crowded. We ordered the Caprese baked ravioli and the dirty garlic and oil angel hair pasta with meatballs.
Came looking for a shotgun and stayed for the meatballs. Wish I could give more than 5 stars.
Wow.  Just discovered this place and my wife and I are in love!  Awesome food. Almost like being with family kind of service.

It was our first time here last week and we've lived in Pensacola for years! Kaitlyn was our server and was super helpful! Knew the menu and drinks like the back of her hand. Staff was super friendly as we were the last ones in there and they greeted us with farewell shots of limoncello. Will definitely be back. Food was amazing!

Great little place!! We sat out on the patio even though it was really cold they had a ton of heaters outside to keep it cozy.  Our server was amazing - Amy was very sweet and attentive.  My husband had the spicy angel hair pasta. I had a custom baked rigatoni dish that was enough for two meals easy. Both were great. I would call the cuisine more American - Italian food versus authentic but still yummy.  The only thing I wish had been different is their shrimp. Being a mile away from the gulf we were very disappointed that the restaurant doesn’t source locally and uses farm raised shrimp. Because of that we wouldn’t order the shrimp and stuck with vegetarian dishes. I think that is a big area for improvement. We are from Michigan and can get farm raised shrimp there. Charge the extra $1 or $2 for the good stuff - I promise people will pay it!!
Lovely, elegant atmosphere, helpful staff, and large portions.

Everything you want from a family owned true Italian run restaurant. The sound of Sal Bonelli singing out front, smell of the fresh roasted herbs and garlic wafting in the air, the taste of amazing wines that pairs so well with each dish, seeing all that delicious cheese melted on the dish. Plan to come early and stay late. This is the place you come to get great food and leave with more friends than you came in with. Staff is always smiling, attentive, and have extensive knowledge of each dish and wines that they carry. I love every dish here and excited to always try new dishes as Chef Dom pushes the boundaries and creates new items. Make reservations early and prepare for a great experience.  Don't forget to try the lemon cello. Home made and it'll make you smile!
Really great meal and the service was perfect. The meal was a ravioli in a vodka sauce topped with meatballs and cheese. I would recommend reservations.....especially if you want to eat inside.
First time at Bonelli's and it was AMAZING! The food and service was excellent.  Will definitely return.

Wonderful food, good wine, and a friendly staff. We love Bonelli's. Great place to indulge in a big ol comforting plate of pasta and order an extra bottle of wine. Everything we've had has been delicious!

Had our Christmas party here. The food was great. The service was great. The waitress and waiter was great. But the bartender (Amy) was excellent.  Her service and  knowledge and help was excellent.  I will be back.
"We're not doing to go orders tonight.... we're just too busy."  Oh ok.  First and last attempt.  Glad business is good.

I just want to say first: the food and atmosphere was amazing! But our server was not the best. Once our food was there we ordered a second bottle of wine to share with the table and more waters (our carafe was empty and all the glasses were less than full), and we didn’t see the wine until THE END of the meal. After reminding her of the bottle she admitted to have forgotten, we didn’t receive the bottle until much later, and after opening the bottle and pouring us all a glass she asked if we needed boxes and proceeded to give us the check...as if this wasn’t bad enough we asked her two more times for more waters while we drank the wine we were supposed to get with the meal and we never got it. After reminding her the third time she admitted she forgot the water but once she had taken payment we never saw her again. Again, the food was really good and I would go back again, but if this woman was our server again I would politely ask the host/ess to please seat us in another server’s section.
Delicious, freshly crafted meals by the Bonelli family. Some times the food takes a little extra time, but it's so worth the wait! Love the espresso cello, the diavlo sauce, and the meatballs!
Restaurant closes at 10 we reached at 9:15 , by the time we check menu and order most fo the items were not available , they could have given us opportunity to taste it
Nice food and good service!!!

Excellent meal! Waitress was great and helpful. The owner stopped to chat, he was very kind.  The food was amazing! Wine was good. Atmosphere was pretty, loved the patio heaters for chilly nights. Will definitely be back.
Awesome!
The food and the service  are amazing.
Amazing service, amazing food, amazing atmosphere.  Perfect on every way!   Thanks Bonellis..we re so happy you are back!
Fabulous food...awesome customer service...huge variety

Bonelli’s is quite simply the best Italian food in Pensacola.  A diavalo entree and a cello go a long way in healing the soul.  Whether it be for a quiet date night or dinner with friends, Bonelli’s has the quality to boot.
The best food and service in Pensacola!

Great atmosphere, service and food.  So glad they are back open.  Anything on the menu will be perfect.  My special choice is the ghost pepper marinara.  Grab a glass and the mushroom appetizer while you peruse the menu.
❤️ Our favorite restaurant for fresh pasta with a cozy atmosphere.  ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Great food, wonderful service, priced very reasonable.
Highly recommend! Not only will you be supporting a local business, but the food here is fantastic. Authentic italian food.
Run down bldg. no sign, answering machine still runs saying will reopen after Covid Florida shutdown. Which now 6/9/20 all restaurants are  opened.

I found this place today and had the most amazing meal.  Food is authentic, atmosphere is casual and friendly and spent some time with Joey Bonelli.  The Lemon Cream Dessert was unbelievable and the service was outstanding.  Serious Italian Food for even NY’ers!  I know... I am one 💪🏽
Best Italian food in the southeast, hands down. Make a reservation and try everything!
Excelent food and service
Good food decent prices for most part
Service was great. Salad fresh. House wine pours generous. Weird mushy eggplant.😞

The wife and I plus our dog Nickie had a great meal at Bonelli's. The wife had a small Greek salad with shrimp and I had the chicken parmesan with angel hair pasta. She rated her food as excellent and my chicken parmesan was also excellent. We sat outside with our dog Nickie and they had heaters outside to keep us warm. Even though we did not have reservations, we were early so they were able to seat us. The service provided by Amy was outstanding. She was very attentive and super friendly. The owner also greeted us and ask us if our meal was satisfactory. He also spoke to us about his Italian ancestry. He was very cordial and friendly. All in all it was a great evening meal. Highly recommend!!
Great place for a date.
Got to dine in the annex which is a small house next to the main restaurant. Was cozy and romantic. The service and food were both fantastic. If you're looking for good Italian food look no further!

The staff is very friendly and the customer service is great. I would have given them 5 stars but I made a RSVP and they set me and my family at a high table and my son could not reach the table. I asked for another table and the staff member said they did not have anymore even though there was 2 tables open. Normally I gave a great experience but this was a bad experience for me so I left. The food is amazing.
One of the best Italian restaurants I have been to
Spectacular food great service.  Take the time to make reservations.  The staff and owners are wonderful.
Great food. Great staff
Delicious --everything we have ever eaten here was outstanding.
Liked this place.  Have a lot off sauce options.  You pick sauce, pasta, then protein.
Always a treat.  Cozy and delicious food. The Staff is top notch with attention to every detail.
Great owners, low key, friendly, excellent food.
The food and atmosphere was amazing!  Marlon, our waiter, was awesome. Will definitely be coming back.
Great pasta, great wine deals, especially on Wednesday.

What a place!!!  First time here and definately not our last!! The best Italian food in all of Pensacola!!!  I had eggplant parmesan  that was to die for!!  The eggplant was done perfect and not breaded!!!  I had angelhair pasta which was so thin and delicious and the portions are really large.  My husband had Lasagna which he loved and our friend had spaghetti and meat balls which were large and so good!!  There is a really nice patio for outdoor dining with incredible entertainment!  This woman was playing the cello so beautiful!!  You definitely need reservations to come here as we were here on a Thursday night and it was packed!!  It has become our favorite Italian restaurant afternonly one visit!!!

bonnelli's is an upscale restraunt that is newly renovated. Food is authentic and made ONLY after you place an order, reservations required to guarantee a table. Tables are inside, patio, awning, back porch, bar. Located on the West side of 9th Ave in Pensacola. Well worth a visit for a special evening, 5 pm to 10 pm.
The best in town☝️
I’ve never had a bad experience here, ever! I love the food, the veggie/vegan options & of course, the wine!! Very friendly service as well.
The best Italian food in Pensacola, hands down! Friendly staff and owner! Make reservations.
The most authentic, delicious, and homestyle Italian experience you'll find in Pensacola, bar none.
The chicken and veal parmesan was fantastic.
Made us feel like home food was out of this world
Taking my date here tonight hope its good!
Absolutely amazing! I can't believe I have missed out on this fabulous food...never knew Bonelli's was here.  I will definitely be back, especially to sit outside on the patio.
Great service, food, and pricing!!!
Amazing place good is delicious and the staff makes you feel like you've been there forever amazing staff
Flavor and customer service!
Great place

My first time at this restaurant. I had one of the evening specials which was ravioli with 4 different  cheeses covered with an acorn squash sauce. Not sure I described it exactly right but it was excellent! Will definitely go back to try different entrees. If you like Italian you should give them a try!

Arrived at 6:40 pm for dinner for two people, and we were promptly turned away as they were "booked". There were multiple tables in the main dining room that were vacant and the outdoor patio only had one table occupied. Disappointed by the lack of accommodation to say the least. Any other restaurant would have figured out a way to serve two additional people (esp with an almost empty restaurant), but that didn't seem to be their priority.
That Joey's Ravioli!! Good Lord! Amazing! Order it!
Absolutely amazing! I can't believe I have missed out on this fabulous food...never knew Bonelli's was here.  I will definitely be back, especially to sit outside on the patio.
Hands down the most authentic Italian food in Pensacola.
Excellent food!
Authentic Italian food family owned and operated love it!!
Great local vibe. Pasta is great and so is the ice cream. Would suggest!

Great food. Very engaging owner. Joey spent a lot of time visiting with us tonight and worked us in without a reservation. The baked ravioli is wonderful. If anything should be improved it is the wine selection. They give you great pours but I didn't like their selection. Terrific service and friendly. Definitely a place to eat but get a reservation!

I was looking for an authentic italian restaurant and finally found it!! I lived in Italy for 4 years and this is the first time anyone has even come close to the real thing, but Bonelli's gets it right every time. We have been here 4 times now and try something different each time. We are never disappointed!
Really nice dinner. Interesting menu, expertely prepared and friendly service. Give this place a try if you're in the area

If you believe that food can be so good that you would slap your own mother, might I suggest you never go here. A true Italian Family Restaurant, the Bonellis would frown on that kind of behavior. But the food definitely fits the bill!
Varied and delicious offerings. Weekly changes to specials! Tried the Pesto the first night, best I've ever had, thick and authentic sauce.
One of the Best Italian in town
This pasta is TO DIE FOR. Dont ever go here especially if you live far away because you will become addicted and die if you do not have it.
Great food, locally owned, and nice ambience in East Hill. Tonight there was live music on the deck. Full bar too!
Best Italian in Pensacola!
Excellent food and staff!
A first-rate family Italian restaurant! Try the baked dishes and the cello drinks!

Amazing place!! The deck is definitely the place to sit when the sun is setting it's so beautiful! We tried the mushroom appetizer (by recommendation of our server) and it was TO DIE FOR. Especially on top of the bread! My husband had the special Korean BBQ Pork and Pineapple Ravioli and I had the Baked Rigatoni and both were amazing!! We literally had 4 or 5 bites of the entrees and were already stuffed because they were so big! Thank you so much!
Best Italian in town

What a great night. Wine Wednesday’s with special pricing. Food was fabulous and the service was great. We enjoyed the accomplished Cello player”  Cello Salad ( yes real name) playing on the patio as we dined. This is an evening to be enjoyed and not rushed. The homemade  lemoncello delicious. Great job we will be back next month when Cello is back.
very cheesy,  great service (thanks Maria), a very nice addition
Food and wine were awesome. Marie was amazing and Gina and family were spot on. We will be back for more. Thank you guys
Fabulous....looking forward to our next visit. Everything was perfect. Food is delicious. Service was wonderful
Love the place , great food and awsum service
Great place, great food, great staff. What more could I ask for. Don't be afraid of the ghost pepper sauce it's delicious.

Wow...what a treat for the senses! The food was AMAZING.  A culinary delight!  Cheese and garlic abound!   Our waitress knew the menu inside out and met all of our needs without hovering.  You can dress up or wear shorts and birks, all are welcome.  Don’t be alarmed if you’re seated in the b-side every detail was lovely!
Oh My- the best Italian in Pensacola! (Homemade Cheese Ravioli with Vodka Sauce special is fabulous!!)

Went here based off a suggestion from a born local on my flight and who became friends with the Bonelli family. The staff were very nice and welcoming and the owner Joey even introduced himself after I told the hostess that I came here from a suggestion from a passenger on my flight during my work trip.  If you want an absolute great dining experience come in early and sit at the bar. Justin was amazing and made for a great time with the different kinds of drinks he made me and suggested the vodka meatball dish which was freaking great and apparently a favorite of the regulars. Flavorful sauce, well made ravioli, large portion size and good cheese.  The entry definitely underplays how good this place is. Not a very fancy sign or setting but you can tell the history of the place. And the converted house to bar and restaurant addition was pretty cool. Take care of Justin. He was awesome and newly married. Tip him big.
Great food. Fantastic service!
Food was excellent, staff was very friendly, and prices were reasonable

The food is authentic Italian food from family owned recipes who came here from Italy!  The portions are very generous and sooo delicious!   The prices are reasonable and service is top notch!  Make a reservation because they are always busy!  Love this restaurant!   Highly recommend!
Great food friendly people.
Good food, great service, but a little pricey.
We're from out of town so were pretty upset we won't get to come back

Our first visit. Food was wonderful. Freshly prepared for us and delicious. The people that work there were the best. Very helpful with the menu items and knowledgeable about what they offered. We had a great meal and a great time.

I felt like I was part of their family as soon as I walked through the door. The staff treated me like I was an old time friend and I was coming for a visit. If you are looking for a good atmosphere, this is it. And the chicken parmigiana is awesome.
Fantastic food and the staff are next to none.
Amazing food!  Great service.  Family owned and operated and it shows in their care of their customers!  Thank you Bonelli family!

My wife and I went to dinner here for the first time. Great service, lovely atmosphere, food was delicious. We had the lasagna and rigatoni, along with the Italian creme for dessert. We'll be back very soon!

Amazing little Italian place that is expanding. You can tell the new construction layout is going to be beautiful. Our waitress made it so special with the wine tastings. The owner stopped by to say hi and the food was absolutely delicious. Vibe was spot-on perfect music selection and perfect lighting I'm a stickler for both.
food was great. portion sizes are perfect. service was spot on.
I’ll never order from this place gross
Great little Italian place. I'm sure it's a local favorite, but we're from out of town, and will definitely be back!
Intimate, romantic, cozy,  delicious.

Justin was our server and he was very attentive but not overbearing.   The dining rooms in the little house make for a nice ambiance.   The food is very good.  Made to order dishes, unlimited bread on table, and overall lovely dining.  There is even a large outdoor patio with a fire table.  Make sure to make your reservations a day ahead even on a weekday.
Service is great. They were all so kind and helpful. Food was great and lord the portion are huge lol absolutely recommended.
its freakishly good

One of the best Italian restaurants we’ve had in Florida. We ordered the meatballs, cheese ravioli, and rigatoni. All were very good. Service was a little slow but our server made up for it with his hospitality. Great authentic little restaurant.
Very nice with great food!  Call for reservation!!
Fantastic place
Fantastic pasta,delightful staff and cozy atmosphere
I can’t get enough of the food here and I love the friendly atmosphere.

Food was very good. We dined outside and listened to some pleasant tunes from a local group. Fighting the flies was the worst experience and the servers were not very greeting. Had to stop her several times to get her attention. Waited 15 minutes for the check.
Best Italian food around amazing every time I go.

We had a reservation. Apparently, you're just supposed to know to go look at every table to find your name. It took a while to get waters brought out...our server did comp the one glass of wine that was ordered. She was fine but seemed rushed and overworked. The food, once it finally came wasn't impressive. For a $20 plate of pasta, I expect more. The Alfredo sauce was more like Alfredo soup. There was really nothing special about anything any of us had.  We ate outdoors and there were 5 gallon buckets filled with water not ten feet from our table...the overall vibe from everyone I saw that worked there was stressed and uncomfortable.  Overall, would not recommend.
Incredible food and the service was SO happy and fun!
Best Italian food I've tasted so far in Pensacola
Food is great can't wait to try more dishes.
Perfect.
Thank you Dawn and Joey for a wonderful dinner with my wife! Finished it off with an espresso. Really enjoyed the chicken parmesan. Can't wait to see the covered area finished.
Both the service and the food was great(had the lasagna)! Very attentive server(I believe his name is Justin).
Love, love, love Bonelli's Italian Cafe! The food, the staff the ambiance are all terrific!!!
Amazing food!!!!
Amazing gluten free dinner.

We didn't have a reservation; however, the owner got us a table for 4 and we were very greatful. Justin was our server (and bartender) and he was awesome! The food was delicious and the portions were large!! Just didn't have room for dessert! Have to try the pineapple habanero cello...so good!!!

The cello flight was delightful. Tried a new red wine and was excellent-Dornfelder. Alas, the angel hair and meatballs and the lasagna were disappointments. The waitress was helpful and attentive. Great outdoor eating area and cozy inside dining.
This place is seriously great. Delicious food, relaxed atmosphere. Reservations are definitely recommended since, until their remodel sits complete, there are very few tables.
Amazing.  The perfect small family owned Italian restaurant.  Service was great, menu and drink selection was very broad, and the family feel you get from being there is overwhelming in a great way.
Excellent food. Great portions
Authentic Old World style Italian food.
Fantastic as always! Joey Bonelli and family are a class act!
Pricey for no good reason, the food was mediocre and the service was lacking! It might have been a busy time but we waited forever for our food and bread.

Wow, I have heard over and over, if you want Italian food, go to Bonellis! So....I took the advice and ordered a glass of wine (Wine Wednesday), and ordered a house salad along with Gina's vodka sauce and wow.... it was amazing! My friend ordered the ziti with the Sal's Red Sauce with meatballs and whoa!  The food was fantastic, the wine, beer and liquor selection were great, and Justin was a great bartender. Yes, I said bartender.  They have two buildings; one main area (which most people see),  and the back building (next to the patio with a glass firepit) has a bar with a quaint atmosphere.  Check this place out, you will NOT be disappointed!

My favorite Italian place ever! The specialty dishes are always a treat, especially anything that includes their amazing huge homemade ravioli.  The baked dishes are extremely generous and easily splittable unless you want to treat yourself to leftovers!  Salad is also large and wonderful.  I havent had anything yet I don't love or recommend.

Our reservation was for 7pm.  We were seated at 745.  The first actual plate of food arrived at 830.  The food was substanard.  My chicken marinara was barely warm, the chicken was chewy and the noodles wer
Best Italian food in town, the deck is a very comfortable spot to have a drink by a fire with a few friends after a nice dinner.
Awesome meal as usual
Excellent service, delicious food, pricey
Visiting from out of town.  Excellent food and service.  Ordered the angel hair pasta with the dirty oil. They were happy to add pancetta and spinach - delicious.  Don’t judge a book by its cover!
Great food
It's ALWAYS excellent.   I would have a great picture but I gobbled the deliciousness up before I could snap a shot!!
Food is great and so is the staff!

Didn't like to be waiting for hour and half to get served. Food had to be carried from one building to another thru the courtyard and was cold when we got it. Server was a little clueless on certain items.
Great italian atmosphere and food
Best italian food in pensacola by far!!
AMAZING FOOD! THE BEST! WONDERFUL DESSERT! FANTASTIC SERVICE!
Frontside, backside, I love all the sides.
Fantastic food, great environment, never disappoints!
Really good place to get Italian food

Bonelli's was absolutely amazing! My family of 4 made a reservation this Saturday for my birthday dinner. Marlon was our helpful, laid-back waiter (who made sure to hook us up with a dessert once he found out it was my birthday - super sweet!). We had the saucy shrimp and potato croquette for appetizers, both of which were awesome and pretty sizeable for apps. I got Joey's Baked Ravioli and oh. my. god. It was DELICIOUS! Best Italian food I've ever had. We'll definitely be back!
Great food. Nice outdoor seating area with fire pit.
Great food and service, we were very pleased with our meal here.

Awesome place to eat. The service was great. The bread like velvet. The food is homemade to order. Just wonderful. The atmosphere is relaxing. They have a nice firepit on the deck, the music is great. I cant say enough. Love it will be going back.
Amazing food
Real Italian food, nicely prepared, with excellent service. Nice people. This was our first visit and a very pleasant experience. We'll be back.
The food, the service, the food, the atmosphere, and, did I mention the food?! Absolutely superb!!!
Hands down the best Italian, don't even bother going anywhere else. Absolutely amazing food and staff
Atmosphere makes you feel like family. Waitress had dark hair very friendly and knowledgeable with menu and items. Will definitely go back and highly recommend this place. Reservations work perfect.
I Love this Place.  True authentic Italians cooking incredible authentic Italian food.  The whole family are assets to the Restaurant business
Wouldn’t take a to-go order because they were busy. As if to-go customers are worthless. Top it off with the snotty attitude the girl had. Thanks! Never again!
Seriously the best Italian food I have had in a long time. Service was awesome! We will be back. This place is a gem! So authentic, fresh and cheesy.

Amazing food, incredible service! Tonight's special (four cheese ravioli with vodka sauce, crumbled meatballs, mozzarella and parmesan) was absolutely fantastic. Pretty much everything is made in house and you can tell. Get the Italian Creme dessert... It's not too heavy, not too sweet... The perfect finish. Alicia was one of the best waitresses we've ever had. Thank you Bonelli's for an amazing birthday dinner... I'm in heaven right now 🤣
Great place Best Italian food .. Service was excellent  will make this a regular place to eat

Was not expecting Italian dishes to have red pepper flakes in sauces. No mention from the waitress or on the menu that the dishes were hot and spicey. Thus is something I would expect from Mexican,  but never Italian. Have been to Italy and did not have that taste in any of the dishes I ate while there.

Fantastic Italian restaurant, and proud to have taken my mom there. The food is delicious and offers good specials. Great atmosphere (especially in the back house area). Feels like you could be dining at home.

You may bave to round the block to find the place but you'll be glad you did. Call ahead for a reservation we got lucky and were seated in the back building.  My daughter and I had lasagna while my wife had angel hair pasta in creme sauce. Everything was delicious.

Excellent service. I had their special of the night. Five 4-cheese ravioli with vodka sauce and meatballs made from scratch. A perfect meal with plenty of leftovers for the next day. Their wine is great and we even tried their chocolate cello madness dessert, which was phenomenal. Must try!
The food is always superb.  Joe and his crew make the experience memorable.
5-Star Spot - Awesome food, great vibe, terrific place!

Family owned, that statement alone says it Personalied service as if you are family . I've always been more of a small ( mom & pops ) guy over corp America. I refuse to use self check outs. This place is "The spot" if you're used to personalized service or just want the best Italian food between here and Chicago or New York city. I have lived in the area 8 yrs never heard of it . untill an angel said go eat there .....This year 2018-2019 I've been 8 times. Its not who you know it's who you are ... *Joey Bonelli / Bonelli family* are in my opinion class acts.
The food, the service,  everything  is fabulous.

Amazing family owned restaurant. You walk in and are immediately hit by a wave of amazing smells. I had bacon wrapped pork ravioli and it was heavenly. I cannot say enough about how great this place is.
The best Italian EVER!😍💞

Excellent service, food is outstanding and well prepared, portion sizes are perfect. Staff is friendly, informative, and attentive. They have a 3 seating sections 1 cozy and older inside in the front, an outside section and a newer, more modern inside seating in the rear.
One of the best Italian spots in town! Great wine selection....and desserts.....ah divino!

This is the best Italian restaurant in the Panhandle/Gulf Coast. The mushroom appetizer was delicious and the eggplant with Rigatoni was absolutely amazing. And the Ravioli was unique. Shrimp Alfredo was the best Alfredo I have ever had. The Italian Creme and Tiramisu were the perfect ending to an Italian feast. The Bonelli Family was interesting and fun. Thanks so much.

A great Italian experience right here in Pensacola! This restaurant has plenty of character and charm and they're working to make it even better (adding additional dining area). If you haven't tried Bonelli's yet then make plans to. Grab your best girl, your best guy, or your most intimate group of friends and go enjoy a beautiful ambiance and tastes of the old country. Kyle was our server and he was spot on in providing great service and in orchastrating a fabulous dinner experience. We tried four different main dishes which we all shared. I've always enjoyed a good Alfredo but I'm almost always disappointed in restaurant Alfredo offerings. Bonelli's stepped up and knocked it out of the park. This was a very pleasant surprise. This is not a budget restaurant in my opinion, but the experience, flavors, service and charm make it worth every penny. Favoloso!

We went there for a Christmas party,had a blast. All the staff was the best.The food was superb my wife had the eggplant parmesan, I had the baked Rigatoni. Definitely going back. The section that we dined In was the house behind the restaurant, looked like a house but it was part of the restaurant. It was a house at one time.

First I will say that the one time we got to eat here the food is amazing but they are horrid as a business. Can never get a seat. Can never get a reservation. No one answers the phone.  When you actually go there, there is no sign saying to wait to be seated or seat yourself. If you seat yourself at an open table it takes ten minutes for them to notice you only to kick you out because apparently every unmarked table is reserved.

Hands down best Italian food! Everything is homemade, you can taste it. You can tell they take pride in what they do. They cater to their customers even when it’s busy. Even our kids favorite place. Would give 10 stars if we could!

Food was awesome , service was awesome, atmosphere was great, took my mother to dinner for her birthday the Bonelli family is a wonderful family they treat you like you are family ,my mother had a great time thank you Bonellis
Great people great service
One of the best Italian restaurants I have ever been to and I have been to many.  A must go even if your within a hour drive!!!
Think I have a new favorite Italian place in Pensacola.  OMGosh so yummy!
Amazing! Great customer service, happy lively environment, indoor/outdoor seating.
Great place for a romantic date on the patio. Food, music, and wine were fantastic!
Great food, service and atmosphere. On the weekends, make a reservation!
Great food and service!!

Thoroughly enjoyed my trip there. I pulled up without a reservation and they managed to seat me although being packed. I was served by Lauren and she was great. Food was great,it was pricey but portions were huge. Would return again if I ever return to the area.
ALWAYS fantastic food and great people! Eggplant Parmesan is wonderful.
Amazing little Italian family restaurant! Huge portions. Good wine list. The sauces are something you want to take home with you in a jar.
Amazing food and service. Love this place.
Always good food in a place like no other.  Very cozy and feels like home. A must go!

Absolutely lovely atmosphere, quaint, cozy little gem on 9th!! The food was amazing. The service genuinely warm and so very friendly. Nice list of wines and the specials I hear are delicious. We tried the lasagna and the baked rigatoni and ate everything!! We will definitely be back!!

Authentic Italian Cuisine..Great Customer Service! The pizza takes awhile to cook but sooo worth the wait..what are you waiting for??Try it out you won't be disappointed and you'll be supporting local business as well. 😁
Very good!
Family!

The atmosphere is personal and cozy. Customer service is excellent. Upon ordering we were immediately notified that their main oven was not working properly but they had smaller ovens available. Therefore food will take a little longer being served. Due to the delay, we were offered a complimentary glass of wine or house salad. And it was worth the wait. Food was awesome. I didn't expect for it to be so delicious. I never been to Italy but this place made me feel like I visited. Even with small dining area, they can accommodate large parties of 10-20 people if called before arrival. I definitely will be a return customer.
Good food and great service.
Great food, great atmosphere, great service. Can't wait to go again.
Very good food and service was excellent.

What an amazing little find! I was looking for a lesser known restaurant to try out in Pensacola and found a gem! The outdoor seating is so cozy and romantic. The food is outstanding and they have a wonderful selection of drinks. We had top notch service also! I can’t wait to come back!
Love this place! They are so sweet and it's a wonderful evening outdoors with the family!
Wonderful authentic Italian food.  We went there for our anniversary  mushroom were devine.

The best Italian food in Pensacola, a great co-owner and manager “JOE” and great cooks in the back “GINA & DOMINIC”, the servers are amazing #one Marlon and Kathy are our favorites. We just love this restaurant “ the vodka sauce” to die for it. Faical with love 💗❤️💕🔥🇮🇹
Excellent, friendly service and amazing food.
Thier pesto pasta was delicious and my friend had the eggplant pasta which was great as well. It was totally worth the cost.
My all time favorite Italian place. Every sauce is fabulous, especially the alfredo, and the limoncello beckons me... I think I hear it calling my name now
Great music as well as food.
True home style Italian Cooking.  Great service and atmosphere.
Great place, nice patio great wine selection. They also just opened a new side which is pretty chill n cool..oh and house made pasta..can't beat that.
Love the food and the staff are super nice and attentive.
Authentic Italian cuisine... I have never had anything that was not absolutely delicious here.

This was a very awesome experience here in Pensacola. Definitely best out of 2 since I've been here. Very small cozy, romantic setting for couples. The cello homemade next door was so good and fragrant, I had the rosemary cello. Although I wish I would have ordered the parmesan chicken instead of beef bake , because it was a little too heavy for me. My boyfriend had the shrimp angle hair pass with the house sauce which was very, very good. We talked to the server aboutusic venues her, and other small cozy restaurants to visit here. But overall this was definitely a place to check out. Remided me of old Austin restaurants, before they got too corperate in Austin, which is what I missed about Austin the most!! Will be going back again!!!
My favorite place in Pensacola! Once they see you meet you they treat you like family. The food is amazing, the service is amazing, it is clean and they are expanding currently!
Amazing food and service

The food was fantastic and transports you into the world of authentic Italian cuisine. The service was friendly and accomodating to special requests if possible. Reservations are recommended as it is a small restaurant with a very cozy atmosphere.
Always great food!
I have eaten in some of the most famous Italian restaurants in USA.  Best italian food I have found is at Bonelli's.

Best Italian food in town! I'm friends with one if the Bonelli's and they always strive to bring you the absolute best! The best food, selection of drinks and so much more! Do yourself a favor and go and eat there!

So very good! We went there on a hunch and were plensently surprised! The food was very very good. There was no official hostess to seat us and the inside seating area was very small. Not sure if it is all the time but the food got to us kind of slow, but our server still talked to us throughout to make it so we didn't feel forgotten.
Great and will go back
The best, authentic delicious food. My pasta was al dante, perfect. I have almost never found that, so I don't order pasta any more. It is run by siblings, charming, they are expanding.

Omg the pesto! It's the real deal, people! The. Real. Deal. I dream about this pesto. I will become a fat girl, voluntarily just to have more of this pesto. I will bathe in this pesto. And then I will eat it out of the tub because seriously, that would be a horrible waste of the most amazing pesto. I want to tell you not to eat here because you will fall in love with the pesto and I don't want to have to fight you for eating all my pesto. But you really need to try the pesto.
Great food, service, and atmosphere.
Excellent food and service.  The shrimp diablo was on point.
Excellent food and service!!!

Best Italian Restaurant Ever!  The food is incredibly delicious - highly recommend the baked ravioli special! . Atmosphere is warm and cozy with a true Italian feel where you are treated like family!  We love this place!
Amazing food. Went with 3 others and we all ordered different apps and entrees. Our server Marina was amazing, and Joey was so welcoming. You must go here for an amazing dinner!!
Never had something so good... I started laughing so much when I tasted  it. I am coming here everytime I what to eat.

I absolutely loved this place. Came here for a date and had a great meal and LOVED the photos in the restrooms. Loved the layout, loved the cozy, close, warm environment. After I finished eating, I went outside and didnt want to leave. Whoever decorated this place, nailed it.
The food is delicious and the service is great.
Delicious Italian food. Excellent staff and service. We will definitely be back. ❤

The service was good but the food wasn't anything special. The red sauce on the meatball appetizer didn't seem to be cooked enough...it still had that raw taste; the Caesar salad was good; chicken parmesan was okay; the lasagna was just ok. It had good reviews (which drew us there) but we wouldn't go back.
Good food friendly staff great vibes
Nice atmosphere and good food
Amazing italian food
Excellent pasta and friendly staff

Amazing food, great wine, and amazing service. The bread is even amazing. The outside seating has a nice romantic vibe. The music choices even impressed me. I'm in love with this tiny restaurant and I can't wait to come back!
Had a great experience. Excellent food at a reasonable price.  Our server Kyle was exceptional and always friendly.  The feeling is very homey and comfortable. Will be eating here again.
Pesto is delicious!
Great food and great atmosphere!
The BEST  Italian food ever......period...plus the family staff are  OUTSTANDING ..... garenteed  you will never have better...
The best Italian in Pensacola.  Love the family and the food.

Horrible service. Much like the other user I went to this place seeing as it was close by to where I was staying and I wanted to eat something local and new since i'm not from the area. Go into the place and the whole outside area is vacant except for two people and then I step inside and their are some tables full but still not packed. I stand there looking at the wait staff whom seem dumbfounded someone walked in only to walk over and a waitress tell me the place is packed full. Needless to say I hope they learn how to run a business sometimes soon.
Very very good food! Absolutely best service!
The atmosphere, food and service were superb!  I'd give this place 10 stars if possible.. A dining experience fit for the gods and just left us wanting more....
Everything is so good Authentic Italian sauce and the meat balls are the best
Nice atmosphere. Food is alright, a bit pricey
Awesome place!!!
Best Italian food in town with awesome service.
The BEST Italian food in Pensacola!
Great Italian restaurant.
Absolutely love this place. Food is delicious. Pizza is the bomb! Atmosphere is cozy!

Extremely personal service and the best Italian around. The owner is always present and making sure your experience is nothing but superb. Food itself is perfectly cooked, matched with great drink specials and pizza you'll love.
Can't wait to come back...super fresh, homemade family recipes! Owner was present and friendly! Staff was great!!
Great Italian
Great food, amazing service!!! Will definitely be coming back!!!!!
Staff very relatable and friendly, food is amazing, simply an amazing place.
Great little place. Awesome food good atmosphere
So yummy! Family joint and you can feel the love! Very personable staff and the best Italian in Pensacola!

If you are gluten free, yiu can bring your own pasta, they keep a separate GF boiling pot available for us. My itallian family eats here. 'Nuf said... シ  Check out the new bar and deck in the back. My new favorite speakeasy style environment!

Service and food is incredible, prices were more than fair for the quality of the experience.I have been to multiple great italian restaurants in the southeast and Bonellis is great, without the stuffiness of V. Pauls.. A relaxed atmosphere with amazing food. Great date night place.
Great atmosphere and even better food, the ravioli is bomb
The best Italian restaurant in Pensacola.

Best Italian food I've ever had. I dream about Bonellis food! The service was fabulous, the environment was cozy and welcoming! The new addition is so much fun! I can't say enough good things about it!
Had the best time. Intimate.  Warm and cozy.  Luv!

So... With all the awesome reviews we thought we might have found a new Italian restaurant in the area.  We went in and discovered that it is a very small place (7 actual tables) so I'm sure when it's warmer the patio helps out a lot.  Call ahead for reservations.  They do give you Italian bread with olive oil and balsamic vinegar which is good but not warm.  The menu is varied and we chose the pasta that you build your own.  They ran out of basil for the pesto sauce so I had to make another choice.  It was bland and they didn't offer grated cheese for the top.  Meatballs that I had weren't that tasty and neither was the chicken my husband had.  Our red wine was served ice cold.  So, all in all it was OK at best.  Salad was great and service friendly and helpful.
Spaghetti is nothing special but the pesto is made to order and the bread and desserts were wonderful. Service was also top notch, really feels like it's been in Pensacola longer than it has been
Cozy spot for amazing food. The service is always excellent as well.
It was amazing. Crowded but amazing.
Great service and great food!  Easy to support local business when they are this awesome!
Nice cozy dining. Excellent service and fabulously delicious food.  Large portions great prices.
Amazing food. Owners very friendly
Little pricey but for the amount of food its great. Its family run and great for kids.
Best italian food I've ever had in my life.  The food,  family and service are all a 10! I so wish I lived closer, we never come in town without coming.
Outstanding family owned Italian restaurant!!
There is very limited space inside, and the customer service is poor.
Great Italian food!

Guys, you have to check them out if you've never been! This is a family owned restaurant and the staff will treat you as one of their own - they are very friendly and accommodating. Bonelli's has a beautiful outdoor deck with firepit and seating area that leads to an awesome speakeasy style bar. The bar is stocked with games to play while you grab a drink and appetizer or while you wait for a table in the restaurant. The food is the real deal here too.. go check them out! You won't be disappointed!!
Great place. Awesome food great family restaurant.
Best ravioli in town!
Awesome food!! Great Service! Very charming and talented lady playing acoustic guitar and singing a great variety of songs...beautiful voice!! Will be back.

How has this place eluded me for so long. Intimate family owned & operated establishment. I had the ravioli w/ vodka meat balls and ate on it for 3 days (no kidding). All smiles at our table. Prices very reasonable and be sure to call ahead …
What a gem.  Best Italian food I've had outside of Manhattan.
